title: Sam Asghari
summary:
Hesam "Sam" Asghari (Persian: حسام اصغری; born March 3, 1994) is an Iranian-American model, actor, and fitness trainer. He has appeared on the television shows Black Monday, Hacks, The Family Business, and in several music videos. Since 2020, Asghari has been the owner of the eponymous Asghari Fitness, a website that offers personalized training programs.
After becoming engaged in late 2021, Asghari married singer Britney Spears in 2022.
